forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the city slumbers under a cover of soft clouds, the overnight air wraps itself around the contours of the San Francisco landscape, whispering secrets of the coming day. With the temperature resting comfortably at around 52 degrees, the gentle west-southwest breeze teases the leaves like a thoughtful lover’s caress. Yet, anticipation hangs in the air, for the sun promises to make its grand entrance come morning. Expect a brilliant canvas to emerge, painted in vivid blues and warm yellows, with a high nearing 66, before settling back to a balmy 64. 

Good fortune will favor those ready to embrace the day, where the sun’s rays will illuminate the iconic sights and sounds of Downtown. Fog clings stubbornly to the edges, merely a shadow of its former self, allowing for moments of clarity where the city’s architecture reaches skyward. A light jacket will suffice against the morning chill, but as temperatures rise, layers may be shed. It’s a day made for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or a quiet moment ensconced at your favorite café, sipping a well-crafted espresso. Perhaps venture out with a book, finding a nook in a sunlit park, letting the fragrance of freshly cut grass mingle with the salty ocean breeze. In this gentle embrace of springtime, the city beckons, inviting exploration and indulgence in the simple pleasures that define San Francisco's charm.
